article_title: James Franco teaches Jimmy Fallon how to take a creepy selfie
article_text:
Topics: Broadway, Instagram, James Franco, Jimmy Fallon, Of Mice and Men, Selfie, Video, Entertainment News

Actor of the stage and melter of preteen hearts James Franco visited the “Tonight Show” on Monday night to share what he’s learned from his 12-week Broadway stint on “Of Mice and Men”: the art of the creepy #selfie, of course. Franco, who enjoys taking selfies with teenage girls and then texting them, opts to wear a baseball cap and dark-tinted sunglasses so he can look good “from any angle.”

Ladies, now you have one more reason to be leery of a dude adopting this look (because it means he idolizes James Franco).
